transcript: i 'm trying to do this in english about four my dad was always whistling around the house and i just thought that 's part of communication in my and actually until i i always annoyed and irritated people with whistling to be honest my whistling is a kind of deviant behavior i whistled everywhere and i also whistled at a christmas eve party with my family in law and and when i hear music that i don 't like i try but it can also sound like this but during a christmas party at dinner actually it 's very annoying so my sister in law asked me a few times please stop whistling and i just couldn at one point and i had some wine i have to admit that at one point i said if there was a contest i would join and two weeks later i received a text message you 're going to america so i immediately called her up of course she googled and she found this world whistling she didn 't expect me to go there and i would have lost my face i don 't know if that 's correct english but the dutch people here will understand what i mean laughter i lost my face and so i went to louisburg north carolina southeast of and and i won there in two thousand and four and to defend my title well let 's go back in two thousand and five and i won again so so i quit my day job as a nurse and i try to live my dream well actually it was never my dream but it sounds so good you are going to whistle along and then always the same thing happens people are watching each other and think oh my god why can i go away no you can 't actually it 's very simple the track that i will whistle is called fte de la belle it 's about eighty minutes long and i want to first rehearse with you your whistling whistle the tone sorry i forgot one thing you whistle the same tone as me and we will see what happens i 'm so used to that i start it myself propose i do that myself he
